name: Chi-Hsuan Huang
title: Front-End Web Developer
aboutMe: I am currently a graduate student in CS and passionate about co-working and sharing information and knowledge with people. I dream of using science and technology to making the world better and solving social Issues. I am one of co-creators of TaiwanStat, the popular Open Data Visualization Community in Taiwan. The TaiwanStat website currently has more than 5,000,000 page views and more than 1,000,000 users visited in 2015.

awards.title: Outstanding Student  Chi-Hsuan Huang - For the Academic Achievement in 2011-2014
Research Creative Award for Undergraduate Student Projects
